pageContext.claim: “Biden's plan for mass amnesty would bankrupt your Social Security system.”
pageContext.analysis: This started out as a false claim in the 2018 midterm elections, limited to Social Security. Democrats had not proposed plans that would reduce Social Security benefits, unlike some Republicans, and in fact many have pushed for greater benefits. When running for re-election in 2020, Trump expanded this to add another falsehood -- that Biden would eliminate protections for people with pre-existing conditions. Biden had no such policy and was a strong supporter of such protections. This is a good example of how Trump simply makes up statements that he thinks will sway votes, without paying attention to the actual policies.
